**Products**

**2\. Signal Data Feeds** 

* Machine-readable signals for systematic strategies  
* Sentiment & event-driven data from 3M+ articles, filings, social posts daily

**Solutions / Use Cases** 

* **Portfolio Managers & Analysts** — Accelerate alpha discovery. Find high-conviction trades in minutes.  
* **Commodity & Macro Traders** — Spot supply shocks, sanctions, weather moves before they hit prices.  
* **Quant Researchers** — Ingest structured sentiment/event data to sharpen models.  
* **Risk & Strategy Teams** — Stress-test portfolios with real-time geopolitical \+ macro matrices.
